Pre-Game Insights: Cleveland Cavaliers are looking to prolong their four-game road winning streak against the Dallas Mavericks.
The Mavericks have a 10-5 record at home and a 2-4 record in close games decided by 3 points or fewer.
Cleveland Cavaliers are 12-3 on the road, scoring 122.4 points per game while outscoring opponents by 11.9 points.
The Cavaliers score 11.0 more points per game than the Mavericks allow (122.4 vs 111.4).
Kyrie Irving is averaging 24.3 points and 4.9 assists for the Mavericks.
Evan Mobley is averaging 18.4 points, 8.7 rebounds and 1.5 blocks for the Cavaliers.
